mapper.select: /* com.ltop.app.menu5.mapper.M5Sub1MapperselectUserInfo */ SELECT mem.userid AS userId , mem.username AS userName , mem.sex AS sexCd , CASE WHEN mem.sex = 'M' THEN '남자' WHEN mem.sex = 'F' THEN '여자' ELSE '' END AS sexName , mem.birthday , mem.tel , mem.height , mem.weight , sleep_time AS sleepTime , position_time AS positionTime , mem.enabled , CASE WHEN mem.enabled = 'Y' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END AS enabledName , mem.mat_id AS matId , mem.agency_no AS agencyNo , (SELECT agency_name FROM tbl_agency WHERE agency_no = mem.agency_no) AS agencyName , auth.auth , (SELECT seq FROM tbl_alarm WHERE userid = mem.userid ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1) AS seq FROM tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth ON auth.userid = mem.userid WHERE 1=1 AND mem.userid = #{userId}

SELECT A.userid AS userId , B.username AS userName , A.seq , A.tel , A.use_yn AS useYn , A.regdate AS regDate FROM tbl_alarm A INNER JOIN tbl_member B ON B.userid = A.userid WHERE 1=1 AND A.userid = #{userId} ORDER BY seq DESC
